definition: to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life

sentences.english: Length of days is in her right hand, and in her left hand riches and glory.
sentences.chinese: 在她右邊是延年益壽，在她左邊是富貴榮華。

sentences.english: Two things doth prolong your life: a quiet heart and a loving wife.
sentences.chinese: 心情平靜妻賢淑，延年益壽多得福。

sentences.english: People to illnesses and physical, longevity, the need to Sibu.
sentences.chinese: 人要祛病強身，延年益壽，需要食補。

sentences.english: This self-massage is aimed at promoting longevity.
Drinking this preparation regularly promotes your health and prolongs your life-span.
sentences.chinese: 常飲本品，促進健康，延年益壽。

definition: to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
conversant with the Confucian classics/to stimulate menstrual flow (TCM)
to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
(TCM) to build up one's kidney yang/to boost male sex drive
